alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenville; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:58PM EDT until July 29 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Southern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Anderson County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Abbeville County in Upstate South Carolina... Southwestern Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 758 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Spartanburg to 3 miles southwest of Greenville Downtown, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Spartanburg, Laurens, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Mauldin, Simpsonville, Clinton, Five Forks and Fountain Inn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Anderson; Greenville; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union
